long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wondered what websites you visit most frequently or how much time you spend online ? Or how many times you've clicked? No? That's okay because I made this anyway!

🎮 Style: ClickClount tracks and records your internet stats the same way many video games do. I've always been a fan of total stats collected by video game

📊 Stats: Track the number of pages visited, mouse clicks, and time spent online to gain an understanding of your internet habits.

🌐 Most Visited Page: Discover which website dominates your online presence and the number of visits it receives via the Google API topSites.

🧹 Clear All: Start over again with the Clear All button

🏆 Achievements (COMING SOON): Unlock achievements based on your internet usage milestones. Celebrate your digital accomplishments!

🔒 Privacy First: ClickCount is built to respect your privacy. All data is stored locally (I don't have access to it whatsoever), ensuring your browsing habits remain private.

🔗 Web Navigation & More: ClickCount seamlessly integrates with web navigation, web requests, and more, providing a holistic browsing experience.

This is my very first deployed web app, I built this to practice JavaScript, HTML, CSS and to familiarize myself with Google's APIs. I had a lot of fun creating this small application and hope to push the needle a little further with each consecutive project. 

📧 Contact Information: If you have any questions or find any issues please feel free to email me @Alanvnorcott@gmail.com or go through my LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alan-norcott-31161523b/

Thanks for checking this out!

- Alan
